recommendations.name: Tad Martin
recommendations.title: Co-founder/CEO, Collective i
recommendations.text: Leona's technical expertise and proactive approach to infrastructure challenges have made a significant impact at Collective i. Her ability to drive improvements and cost savings while maintaining system stability is exceptional.

recommendations.name: Dalin Laqua
recommendations.title: Senior Platform Engineer, Collective i
recommendations.text: Leona quickly proved to be dependable, technically adept, and proactive in resolving complex infrastructure challenges.

recommendations.name: Troy Kinsella
recommendations.title: Senior Platform Engineer, Collective i
recommendations.text: Leona was a collaborative and capable teammate, always ready to troubleshoot, contribute, and improve systems efficiently

recommendations.name: Hani Mohammed
recommendations.title: Professor, Southern Alberta Institute of Technology
recommendations.text: Leona consistently brought creativity, precision, and a strong grasp of modern web development practices to the classroom

recommendations.name: Ricardo De Oliveira
recommendations.title: Professor, Southern Alberta Institute of Technology
recommendations.text: Leona consistently impressed me with her creativity and leadership. She has a knack for turning complex challenges into opportunities for growth.

recommendations.name: Mehdi Shokrani
recommendations.title: Professor, Southern Alberta Institute of Technology
recommendations.text: Leona is an exceptional student who consistently demonstrates strong technical skills and a deep understanding of infrastructure and system design. Her collaborative approach and technical expertise make her an invaluable asset to any team.

recommendations.name: Mamta Verma
recommendations.title: Professor, Southern Alberta Institute of Technology
recommendations.text: Leona demonstrated strong leadership, technical depth, and a commitment to quality throughout their capstone project
